docs.snippet: Chris Kluwe, a punter for the Minnesota Vikings for eight seasons, wrote a first-person article alleging that team officials asked him to stop speaking about gay rights....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Kluwe, a punter for the Minnesota Vikings for eight seasons, wrote a first-person article alleging that team officials asked him to stop speaking about gay rights.
docs.abstract: Free-agent punter Chris Kluwe, whose outspoken views on gay rights and other issues of equality have drawn widespread attention, accuses a Minnesota Vikings assistant of harassment and homophobia in a first-person account published on the website Deadspin; after eight seasons with the Vikings, Kluwe was cut in May.

headline.main: Support for Gay Rights Led to Harassment, Ex-Viking Says
